S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-3376: Test case in GrantRevokeDDLTest commented out
This change adds some additional tests to GrantRevokeDDLTest.
The test cases were originally contributed by Yip Ng (yipng168 at gmail dot com)
The tests were originally written during buddy testing of Derby 10.2, and were committed as part of DERBY-1736, but were commented out at the time due to DERBY-1589. The test cases now pass, and so this change enables the tests as part of GrantRevokeDDLTest.
